verses.verse: שִׁ֖יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song מִזְמ֣וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [or] Psalm לְאָסָֽף׃ <S%H623><s%> of Asaph אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> O God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not דֳּמִי־ <S%H1824><s%> Keep not thou silence לָ֑ךְ אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּחֱרַ֖שׁ <S%H2790><s%> hold not thy peace וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁקֹ֣ט <S%H8252><s%> and be not still אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> O God

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold א֭וֹיְבֶיךָ <S%H341><s%> For lo thine enemies יֶהֱמָי֑וּן <S%H1993><s%> make a tumult וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֶ֗יךָ <S%H8130><s%> and they that hate נָ֣שְׂאוּ <S%H5375><s%> thee have lifted up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> the head

עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> against עַ֭מְּךָ <S%H5971><s%> against thy people יַעֲרִ֣ימוּ <S%H6191><s%> They have taken crafty ס֑וֹד <S%H5475><s%> counsel וְ֝יִתְיָעֲצ֗וּ <S%H3289><s%> and consulted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against צְפוּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6845><s%> against thy hidden ones

אָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> They have said לְ֭כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנַכְחִידֵ֣ם <S%H3582><s%> and let us cut them off מִגּ֑וֹי <S%H1471><s%> from [being] a nation וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִזָּכֵ֖ר <S%H2142><s%> may be no more in remembrance שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> that the name יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> more

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נוֹעֲצ֣וּ <S%H3289><s%> For they have consulted לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> with one consent יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together עָ֝לֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> Against בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> confederate יִכְרֹֽתוּ׃ <S%H3772><s%> they are
אָהֳלֵ֣י <S%H168><s%> The tabernacles אֱ֭דוֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom וְיִשְׁמְעֵאלִ֗ים <S%H3459><s%> and the Ishmaelites מוֹאָ֥ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְהַגְרִֽים׃ <S%H1905><s%> and the Hagarenes

גְּבָ֣ל <S%H1381><s%> Gebal וְ֭עַמּוֹן <S%H5983><s%> and Ammon וַעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> and Amalek פְּ֝לֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> the Philistines עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> with the inhabitants צֽוֹר׃ <S%H6865><s%> of Tyre

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אַ֭שּׁוּר <S%H804><s%> Assur נִלְוָ֣ה <S%H3867><s%> also is joined עִמָּ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> They הָ֤י֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> have זְר֖וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> with them they have holpen לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children ל֣וֹט <S%H3876><s%> of Lot סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

עֲשֵֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> Do לָהֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> with כְּמִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> unto them as [unto] the Midianites כְּֽסִֽיסְרָ֥א <S%H5516><s%> as [to] Sisera כְ֝יָבִ֗ין <S%H2985><s%> as [to] Jabin בְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> at the brook קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7028><s%> of Kison
נִשְׁמְד֥וּ <S%H8045><s%> [Which] perished בְֽעֵין־ דֹּ֑אר <S%H5874><s%> at Endor הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> became דֹּ֝֗מֶן <S%H1828><s%> they became [as] dung לָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> for the earth

שִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <S%H7896><s%> Make נְ֭דִיבֵמוֹ <S%H5081><s%> their nobles כְּעֹרֵ֣ב <S%H6159><s%> like Oreb וְכִזְאֵ֑ב <S%H2062><s%> and like Zeeb וּֽכְזֶ֥בַח <S%H2078><s%> as Zebah וּ֝כְצַלְמֻנָּ֗ע <S%H6759><s%> and as Zalmunna כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נְסִיכֵֽמוֹ׃ <S%H5257><s%> yea all their princes

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Who אָ֭מְרוּ <S%H559><s%> Who said נִ֣ירֲשָׁה <S%H3423><s%> in possession לָּ֑נוּ אֵ֝֗ת <S%H853><s%> נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> Let us take to ourselves the houses אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> O my God שִׁיתֵ֥מוֹ <S%H7896><s%> make כַגַּלְגַּ֑ל <S%H1534><s%> them like a wheel כְּ֝קַ֗שׁ <S%H7179><s%> as the stubble לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> the wind

כְּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> As the fire תִּבְעַר־ <S%H1197><s%> burneth יָ֑עַר <S%H3293><s%> a wood וּ֝כְלֶהָבָ֗ה <S%H3852><s%> and as the flame תְּלַהֵ֥ט <S%H3857><s%> on fire הָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> the mountains

כֵּ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> So תִּרְדְּפֵ֣ם <S%H7291><s%> So persecute בְּסַעֲרֶ֑ךָ <S%H5591><s%> them with thy tempest וּבְסוּפָתְךָ֥ <S%H5492><s%> with thy storm תְבַהֲלֵֽם׃ <S%H926><s%> and make them afraid

מַלֵּ֣א <S%H4390><s%> Fill פְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces קָל֑וֹן <S%H7036><s%> with shame וִֽיבַקְשׁ֖וּ <S%H1245><s%> that they may seek שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> thy name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD

יֵבֹ֖שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Let them be confounded וְיִבָּהֲל֥וּ <S%H926><s%> and troubled עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> for ever עַ֗ד <S%H5704><s%> and let וְֽיַחְפְּר֥וּ <S%H2659><s%> yea let them be put to shame וְיֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> and perish

וְֽיֵדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> That [men] may know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּ֬ה <S%H859><s%> whose שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> that thou whose name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> alone [is] JEHOVAH לְבַדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H905><s%> you alone עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> [art] the most high עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> over all the earth
